ygData.subject: RE: Where can I find Greater Heal?!-Resolved
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is what I do when I start to buff folks.  Now mind you I am in MM and I am lvl 26 and with a full group mostly. I buff one person at a time with Spirit
ygData.messageBody:
Here is what I do when I start to buff folks. Now mind you I am in MM and I
am lvl 26 and with a full group mostly.

I buff one person at a time with Spirit Armor, Bravery, Endure Magic, and
the first Symbol spell. This cost about 270, which is just under 40% of my
mana (wis of 134). I then get to full mana (unless fights happen) then I
start working on the next person. I never get below HM when I buff folks
because ya never know when you are going to get smacked.

Jaxim


>From: "Rose" <rliu@...>

>From: "Rose" <rliu@...>

>
>Thank you all for responding to my plead for help. I found the greater
>heal
>spell, of all places, in the druid guild in Rivervale. *grumbles*
>
>I have another question though. Specialization. Alternation seems the
>logical skill to specialized in but I have noticed that abjuration seems to
>take HUGE amount of manna. Everytime when I'm done buffing the tanks I am
>OOM. Any advise on which is better to specialize in?
>
>-Imogen =)
